subject: Baseball
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: Through each of Nelson Figueroa’s 101 pitches on Thursday night, 14 of his family members squeezed to the front of Billy Wagner’s box on the first-base side to live every moment.
snippet: Through each of Nelson Figueroa’s 101 pitches on Thursday night, 14 of his family members squeezed to the front of Billy Wagner’s box on the first-base side to live every moment.
